issue.title: Notify Manager - Email Addresses Missing
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

There is a new function for editors to let them notify the manager(s) about the completion of their editing work.
Once the button is pressed, an email is sent to the manager(s). But, unfortunately, neither FROM-email address nor TO-email address is displayed. SUBJECT is OK.
These two informations need to be added to the mail.


**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

From and To field are now filled by the application.
